import { Component } from "@angular/core"; import { Router } from "@angular/router"; import { UserService } from "../../services/user.service"; @Component({ selector: "app-navbar", templateUrl: "./navbar.component.html", styleUrls: ["./navbar.component.scss"], }) export class NavbarComponent { constructor(private userService: UserService, private router: Router) {} get isLoggedIn(): boolean { return this.userService.isLoggedIn(); } logout(): void { this.userService.logout(); this.router.navigate(["/login"]); } }
